duties_responsibilities.duty: Architect, solution, and lead the design, development, and implementation of complex ServiceNow implementations.
Design and configure the FedRAMP ServiceNow instance, and implement domain separation and integrations for Ebonding and data design.
Configure ServiceNow TSM, Service Assurance Workflows, CSM, and ITOM applications.
Work directly to oversee the architecture and development of the entire ServiceNow platform.
Inspire change in the organization through technology solutions and agile software development practices.
Anticipate issues, formulate remedial actions, and provide thought leadership.
Collaborate with the team on code reviews, strategy, and roadmap, and provide technical troubleshooting and diagnostic support.

education_certification.credential: ServiceNow Certified Application Developer (CAD) is a must. Any one of CIS certifications is required, such as CIS-SAM, CIS-ITSM, CIS-Disco.
